title: IN GAME ERROR
body: After one rank game, it shows ERROR unable to start a new game then every time I login my account, it shows the game still in process...but im not and my friends didn't use my account to play games. what's wrong with it ? anybody can help?

replies.body: It doesn't look from my end that your account was being shared or hacked so no worries there. It may just be taking a bit for that match to correctly record the end of game data to the servers, have you been able to get back into any games yet?
